org.globus.opensaml11.md.common
Interface Trust

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicTrust, ShibbolethTrust
public interface Trust

Defines methodology for determing whether or not a system entity should trust the messages issued by another.

Author:
Walter Hoehn

Method Summary
 boolean validate(SAMLSignedObject token, RoleDescriptor descriptor)
          Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.
 boolean validate(X509Certificate certificateEE, X509Certificate[] certificateChain, RoleDescriptor descriptor)
          Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.
 boolean validate(X509Certificate certificateEE, X509Certificate[] certificateChain, RoleDescriptor descriptor, boolean checkName)
          Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.
 

Method Detail

validate

boolean validate(X509Certificate certificateEE,
                 X509Certificate[] certificateChain,
                 RoleDescriptor descriptor)
Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.

Parameters:
certificateEE - the end-entity certificate being validated
certificateChain - additional certificates supplied by the entity (may also contain the end-entity certificate)
descriptor - the SAML 2 role descriptor of the entity purported to be performing the action
Returns:
true if the validation was successful and false if it was not successful

validate

boolean validate(X509Certificate certificateEE,
                 X509Certificate[] certificateChain,
                 RoleDescriptor descriptor,
                 boolean checkName)
Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.

Parameters:
certificateEE - the end-entity certificate being validated
certificateChain - additional certificates supplied by the entity (may also contain the end-entity certificate)
descriptor - the SAML 2 role descriptor of the entity purported to be performing the action
checkName - whether the check the name of the certificate during the validation process, normally true unless the name has already been checked as part of other processing (for example, TLS)
Returns:
true if the validation was successful and false if it was not successful

validate

boolean validate(SAMLSignedObject token,
                 RoleDescriptor descriptor)
Verifies that a certificate or ordered chain of certificates represents a valid credential set for a specific action by a specific entity.

Parameters:
token - the signed object to validate
descriptor - the SAML 2 role descriptor of the entity purported to be performing the action
Returns:
true if the validation was successful and false if it was not successful
